topics.name: Druidic Cycles
topics.content: Ancient druids tracked 19-year Metonic cycles aligning lunar and solar calendars
topics.trading_insight: Long-term cycle recognition in market patterns. The Celts knew that patterns repeat - apply this to market cycles.

topics.name: Ogham Patterns
topics.content: Tree alphabet encoding natural wisdom and seasonal rhythms through symbolic representation
topics.trading_insight: Pattern recognition through symbolic interpretation. Each symbol tells a story - so does each candlestick.

topics.name: Triad Wisdom
topics.content: Celtic triads - three interconnected truths creating balanced understanding
topics.trading_insight: Multi-factor analysis requiring three confirming signals. Never trade on one signal alone.

topics.name: Otherworld Thresholds
topics.content: Liminal spaces between worlds where transformation occurs at sacred boundaries
topics.trading_insight: Support/resistance zones as transition thresholds. Price transforms at these liminal levels.

topics.name: Samhain Wisdom
topics.content: October 31 - End of harvest, beginning of dark half, veil between worlds thins
topics.trading_insight: Year-end positioning, defensive strategies. Prepare for Q4 volatility.

topics.name: Imbolc Renewal
topics.content: February 1 - First stirrings of spring, Brigid's fire lights the way forward
topics.trading_insight: Early trend detection, new cycle emergence. Watch for January Effect reversals.

topics.name: Beltane Growth
topics.content: May 1 - Peak fertility, summer's beginning, fire festivals mark expansion
topics.trading_insight: Growth phase positioning, sell in May consideration. Celtic wisdom says to celebrate but also prepare.

topics.name: Lughnasadh Harvest
topics.content: August 1 - First harvest, Lugh's games, reaping what was sown
topics.trading_insight: Taking profits, harvest gains before autumn volatility arrives.

symbols.triskelion: Triple spiral representing cycles within cycles
symbols.celtic_cross: Union of circle (cycles) and cross (cardinal directions)
symbols.tree_of_life: Interconnection of all things, root to crown
